name: DataPulse Analytics
tagline: Real-time analytics platform for e-commerce companies
description: AI-powered analytics that helps e-commerce companies understand customer behavior in real-time. Predicts churn, identifies upsell opportunities, and optimizes conversion funnels.

name: CodeFlow
tagline: Developer collaboration platform for distributed teams
description: Modern code review and collaboration tool that integrates with all major version control systems. Features AI-powered code suggestions and security vulnerability detection.

name: TalentSync
description: Automated recruiting platform that uses AI to match candidates with roles, schedule interviews, and predict candidate success. Reduces time-to-hire by 60%.

name: CloudForge
description: Enterprise DevOps platform for automated infrastructure management, security compliance, and cost optimization across multi-cloud environments.

name: ServiceHub
tagline: Marketplace connecting businesses with vetted service providers
description: B2B marketplace for professional services. AI-powered matching, automated contracts, and escrow payments. Takes 15% commission on transactions.

name: QuantumChip
description: Developing quantum processors for enterprise computing. Targets pharmaceutical R&D, financial modeling, and cryptography. Hardware + software stack.

name: NeuralEdge
tagline: Edge AI processors for autonomous systems
description: Custom AI chips optimized for edge computing in autonomous vehicles, drones, and robotics. Low power consumption with real-time processing.

name: GeneSynth
description: Machine learning platform that predicts molecular interactions and designs drug candidates. Partners with pharmaceutical companies for clinical trials.

name: CivicOS
tagline: Digital transformation platform for government agencies
description: End-to-end platform for digitizing government services. Handles citizen portals, document management, compliance tracking, and inter-agency coordination.

name: GovProcure
tagline: Modern procurement and contract management for public sector
description: Streamlines government procurement processes with e-bidding, contract lifecycle management, and compliance automation. Reduces procurement time by 70%.
